verses.text_plain: Then answered all the wicked men and men of Belial, of those that went with David, and said, Because they went not with us, we will not give them ought of the spoil that we have recovered, save to every man his wife and his children, that they may lead them away, and depart.
verses.verse_html:
22Then answered all the wicked men and men of Belial, of those that went with David, and said, Because they went not with us, we will not give them ought of the spoil that we have recovered, save to every man his wife and his children, that they may lead them away, and depart. ▼
▼ those: Heb. men

tokens.definition: אֱנוֹשׁ ʼĕnôwsh, en-oshe'; from H605 ; properly, a mortal (and thus differing from the more dignified 120); hence, a man in general (singly or collectively):—another, × (blood-) thirsty, certain, chap(-man); divers, fellow, × in the flower of their age, husband, (certain, mortal) man, people, person, servant, some ( × of them), stranger, those, their trade. It is often unexpressed in the English versions, especially when used in apposition with another word. Compare H376 .
